events.description: During the event, all hunters HR 11 and above will be able to encounter Banbaro in swamp habitats and Radobaan in desert habitats more frequently than usual.

Get ready to welcome Azure Rathalos in its very first appearance! We’ll also have time-limited Special Quests rewarding a hunter medal and appearance rates of Rathalos and Azure Rathalos will be boosted over the weekend.

All hunters HR 11 or above will have the chance to complete time-limited event quests to obtain items that can be used to upgrade your equipment, such as Dragonite Ore and Carpenterbugs, as well as items like Monster Bone+ and Zenny.

As part of our ongoing event, A Happy Hunting New Year, we’re starting 2024 with a bang, with Black Diablos appearing in desert habitats, as well as Event Quests rewarding exclusive equipment, Zenny, and a hunter medal!

events.summary: A Happy Hunting New Year - Increased Monster Activity
events.description: Monsters in all habitats will reappear in shorter intervals and in higher numbers than usual.

Quests rewarding 2024 Weapon Tickets, which will allow you to forge grade 3 weapons. There are six levels of quests, some of which include getting to a certain hunter rank or slaying a monster of a certain strength.
Year-end event with special campaigns for rookie hunters, including Rookie Hunter Gifts and quests for obtaining grade 3 weapons.
Handing out 5 Potions and 5,000 Zenny to all new hunters who join Monster Hunter Now.
